sentences.en: A faint aroma of coffee attracted his attention.
sentences.cn: 淡淡的咖啡香味一下子吸引了他。

sentences.en: A tantalising aroma of roast beef fills the air.
sentences.cn: 空气中充满诱人的烤牛肉香味。

sentences.en: As they bake, they perfume the whole house with the aroma of apples and spices.
sentences.cn: 他们烤蛋糕的时候，整幢房子都飘着苹果和香料的香气。

sentences.en: Experience the natural aroma of Mystique.
sentences.cn: 体验这种神秘的自然香味.

sentences.en: He sat at his breakfast table, enjoying the aroma of coffee.
sentences.cn: 他坐在饭桌旁吃早餐, 享受着咖啡的香味.

sentences.en: He was conscious of the faint, musky aroma of after-shave.
sentences.cn: 他意识到剃须后有淡淡的麝香味。

sentences.en: The air was heavy with the aroma of the paddy fields.
The aroma of fresh bread penetrated the whole house.
sentences.cn: 满屋子散发着新鲜面包的香味.

sentences.en: The fruit owes its extraordinary aroma to a mixture of three main chemicals.
sentences.cn: 这种水果独特的芳香来自于3种主要化学物质的混合。

sentences.en: The heady aroma of wood fires emanated from the stove.
sentences.cn: 炉子里散发出木柴燃烧时的浓烈香味。

sentences.en: The musty aroma of incense made her head swim.
sentences.cn: 熏香发霉的气味令她感到头晕。

sentences.en: The room was saturated with the aroma of coffee.
sentences.cn: 那房间弥漫着咖啡的芳香.

sentences.en: The whole house was filled with the aroma of coffee.
sentences.cn: 满屋子都是咖啡的香味.

sentences.en: The younger woman could almost smell the tantalizing aroma of purple lilacs.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻妇女几乎嗅到了紫丁香诱人的芬芳.
